mapper.select: SELECT A.U_ID ,A.EMAIL ,A.USER_NAME ,A.REG_DATE ,A.UPDATE_DATE ,A.ROLES ,A.POINT ,A.STATUS ,A.LAST_LOGIN_DATE ,A.REMARK1 FROM T_USER A WHERE U_ID = @U_ID
SELECT A.U_ID ,A.EMAIL ,A.PASSWORD ,A.USER_NAME ,A.REG_DATE ,A.UPDATE_DATE ,A.ROLES ,A.POINT ,A.STATUS ,A.LAST_LOGIN_DATE ,A.REMARK1 FROM T_USER A WHERE EMAIL = @email AND STATUS <= 0
SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) CNT FROM T_USER WHERE EMAIL = @email
SELECT COUNT(USER_NAME) CNT FROM T_USER WHERE USER_NAME = @user_name
